content.question: In Triumph of the Name of Jesus, Giovanni Battista Gaulli uses sculpture and painting to

choices.label: draw attention to the architectural innovations of the church
erase a clear division between the ceiling’s illusionism and the church structure
engender a feeling of intimacy through the confined space of the barrel vault
create distinctions between the arts of painting, sculpture, and architecture

content.answer: erase a clear division between the ceiling’s illusionism and the church structure

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
